title: Salmon Cookies
sub: Utilizing JavaScript to Populate HTML Dynamically
body: Showing projected sales at various locations, it displays these projections on a table and allows the user to add locations to the chart via a form.

title: Chocolate Pizza
body: A project in which a design was given and I made it come to life with HTML and CSS.

title: Fight Code
sub: A Game to Test Your Coding Skills.
body:
A web based fighting game with JavaScript and HTML questions. Built in four days from conception to deployment, by a four person self managed team using:

  • - GitHub Projects for work flow
  • - HTML & CSS
  • - JavaScript

title: write-me
sub: A PyPI Package to Automatically Generate Your README
body: Created by a five person team in four days. Write-me generates concise, effective, and specific READMEs for Python, Django, Flask, Pyramid, or any project. Searching through the codebase under which it is installed, it uses filepaths, docstrings, web framework specifications, installed requirements, continuous integration (TravisCI and Coveralls badges), and other user-added data to generate a professional and informative README.md file.

title: Social Recon
sub: Application That Locates and Compiles Information About Online Personalities.
body:
Given a username and/or email address, you can investigate your own online presence, easily see if a username and email is already in use, summarize the digital footprint of someone you know, or uncover the person behind a specific username.
Initially a four day group project started by a four person team, we now have a fifth member and a translation in French.

title: JamShare
sub:
Community for Musicians to Store, Share, and Collaborate on,
Personal and Original Individual Instrument Tracks
body: JamShare is an open-source, music-sharing platform designed to allow musicians to share individual components of their music, (like a guitar riff or individual drum tracks), and connect with other artists who are looking for collaboration on their own jam. With the opportunity for mix engineers, audio techs, and mastering engineers to join the community.
